reviews.comments:
El alojamiento es muy bonito. Esta muy bien equipado, la limpieza es excelente.
Volvería sin dudarlo.
Nos gustó mucho.
Todo aquí es maravilloso, estuvimos 10 días alojados con mi familia y Carlos resultó ser un anfitrión insuperable, votamos por que sea Ministro de Turismo!
Excelente. Muy bien equipada. Super cómoda. Ubicación accesible.
Excelente el departamento, muy cómodo, iluminado. Muy bien equipado. La atención de anfitrión inmejorable.

Depto super moderno, con todo funcionando, hermoso y super cómodo. Lo único q le falta para los q nos gusta mirar un poco de televisión al acostarnos es televisores en ambas habitaciones. Después estuvo todo perfecto. Carlos es muy buen anfitrión! Y da seguridad. Esta muy bien ubicado, nosotros pudimos hacer mucho caminando desde ahi. Muy recomendable!

La departamento de Carlos es realmente un lujo. Tiene todo lo que uno necesita para una estancia en Buenos Aires. La cocina está perfectamente equipada, así también las habitaciones y demás espacios. El edificio a su vez cuenta con un hermoso patio con asador.
Párrafo aparte para la atención de Carlos. Un genio! Cualquier cosa que hemos necesitado estuvo siempre muy predispuesto a solucionarla.
Totalmente recomendable.
Carlos fue un anfitrión muy atento. El departamento es nuevo y muy cómodo. Funcionó todo de maravillas. Esperamos volver!
El departamento es hermoso. Muy cómodo.  La ubicación inmejorable. La atención de Carlos es fantástica. Se pasa de amable. Lo recomiendo absolutamente.
Todo perfecto!

Todo coincidió con el anuncio. Es más de lo mostrado. Nos encanto el techo vidriado y lo amplio de las habitaciones. Tiene todas las maquinas domesticas que se necesitan. Quizá faltarían mas fuentes o bowls para ensaladas. Volveríamos con gusto.

El departamento es increíble y nos ha resultado muy cómodo tanto para esparcirnos como para desarrollar el resto de nuestras actividades, muy atento y servicial, la agradecemos que haya echo nuestra estancia tan agradable

Todo bien. Carlos muy amable y muy dispuesto a colaborar. Cumplió con todo lo comprometido. El apartamento estaba muy bien, muy limpio y con todos los elementos y equipos necesarios. Agradecemos su colaboración y estamos muy agradecidos.

Hugo

Un departamento amplio, luminoso y comodo. Muy equipado. Bien ubicado, cerca de todo tiendas, bares y pequeños lugares de diseño y moda. 
Carlos es un anfitrión excelente, dispuesto en todo momento y lo expuesto es acorde a lo que se ve en la pagina.
El departamento nos encantó, muy cómodo y bien ubicado. Además Carlos es muy atento siempre preocupado de que estés bien y dispuesto a hacer recomendaciones locales. Super recomendable!
Excelente departamento, muy cómodo y buena ubicación. Carlos fue un buen anfitrión, siempre estuvo muy atento. Quedamos muy felices con nuestra estadía.
Es muy bueno el apartamento, tal cual las fotos, Carlos y Luisina, muy buenos anfitriones lo recomiendo muchísimo

Apartamento excelente, confortable, diáfano ...cerca de la zona del Soho donde está MUY BIEN con bares de terrazas para tomar café, cerveza, cenar,... y también para compras.

Estupenda opción.

Carlos es un excelente anfitrión! Siempre estuvo disponible para responder nuestras preguntas y ayudarnos en todo. El depto está perfecto para 4 personas, muy equipado y limpio. Está muy bien ubicado cerca de todos los medios de transporte.

El departamento super lindo, espacioso, limpio, bien ubicado, con una terraza muy agradable..
 Carlos el anfitrion Excelente, en todo momento disponible para cualquier duda, muy amable y atento.
  Definitivamente se los recomiendo muchisimo, pasamos una semana Increible, ningun problema . Estuvimos mi esposo y mis 2 hijos muy contentos .
  Excelente opcion!!!! Sin duda si volvemos , volveriamos a llegar ahi.
Muy buena disposición y el departamento perfecto. Tal cual está descrito

Carlos es una persona muy amable, que en todo momento se preocupó porque estemos cómodos y no faltara nada. Viajamos con niños pequeños y todo lo que necesitábamos Carlos lo consiguió. 

El departamento está muy bueno. Realmente es como muestran las fotos. Usamos varias veces el quincho, un muy buen lugar. No pudimos usar la piscina por la temporada, pero la visitamos y promete mucho.

Sin lugar a dudas, volveríamos.

Carlos nos trató excelente en nuestra estadía en su departamento, siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos e indicarnos cómo movernos a donde queríamos llegar. El departamento es muy acogedor y está muy bien ubicado en Palermo, las fotos muestran tal cual es el lugar. Totalmente recomendado!!

El departamento fue incredible!  Nosotros tuvimos un magnifico experienza y tiempo porque el departamento. Carlos fue muy bien con ayudar y Nosotros quiremos mundarse ahora y nunca salir.  Muchas gracias por todos!!
Buenísimo. Salvo unos detalles menores, el departamento es muy bueno. Y Carlos es muy buen anfitrión.

La verdad, Carlos nos hizo sentir como en casa, desde la llegada nos dio todas las explicaciones del sector donde estábamos, que restaurantes estaban cerca, las estaciones del subte, supermercados, etc. La limpieza del apartamento y comodidad excelente, recomendado para quienes quieran visitar Buenos Aires y pasar unos días en esa ciudad. Durante nuestra estadía estuvo siempre pendiente de cómo estábamos, que necesitábamos. Muy buen anfitrión.

La experiencia de haber habitado nueve días el depto de Carlos cumplió ampliamente todas mis expectativas! Es un depto amplio y bien mantenido, cerca del metro y en una área muy tranquila y accesible a cualquier lugar de la ciudad.

Carlos es muy buen anfitrión. El apto es perfecto, muy bien ubicado, cómodo y muy lindo. Súper recomendado.
Carlos is a very good host. The place is well located, comfortable and very nice. Very recommended!!!

Viajé a BA junto con mi mujer y mis suegros y quedamos en el apartamento durante 4 noches. La atención de los anfitriones perfecta, tanto de Carlos como de su hermano que nos recibió el primer día. Se nos adelantó la llegada a la ciudad varias horas y no hubo ningún problema en llegar antes de lo previsto al apartamento. Carlos nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos (información de transporte, reserva de taxi, lugares donde cambiar dinero, etc). 

El apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos y localizado muy cerca de los outlets de Palermo (5/10 minutos caminando). Para ir a la zona turística está un poco más distante, pero tiene metro (subte) a unos 10 minutos caminando y en media hora llegas al centro de BA. Por la noche está cerca de bastantes opciones de restaurantes y bares para tomarse una copa. Si tu idea es conocer algo más de BA que las típicas postales turísticas, cenar y salir por donde lo hace la gente de BA y aprovechar para hacer unas compras a buenos precios, este es tu apartamento.

La viaje fue buenísima! El piso es lindo así como las fotos! Me encanto muchísimo!! Carlos es súper buena onda Y atencioso! Nos ayudo con todo! Se me voy a BA de nuevo me quedaría allá con certeza! 

A Viagem foi ótima!! O apartamento é lindo assim com as fotos! Fiquei encantada! O Carlos é um amor d pessoa super prestativo e atencioso! Nos ajudou com tudo! Se eu voltar a Buenos Aires, com certeza ficarei em seu apartamento!

Carlos fue super servicial y muy atento a todo lo que necesitamos. Se preocupó por que nuestra estadía fuera cómoda y no solo con lo pertinente al apto.  El apartamento es muy cómodo y funcional y no le falta nada para pasar unos dias disfrutables. Muy bien equipado, con internet, ascensor, camas cómodas, aire acondicionado y televisión dital.

El lugar es increíble. Un departamento espacioso, limpio, ordenado, moderno. Queda entre medio de dos avenidas importantes (Av. Corrientes y Av. Córdoba), con transporte cercano, muchas tiendas, gimnasio, farmacia, supermercados, etc.
Carlos es un gran anfitrión, preocupado, y dispuesto a ayudarnos.
Si vuelvo a Buenos Aires con todo gusto vuelvo a arrendar ahí!

Excelente atencion, totalmente personalizada por Carlos y el apartamento en optimas condiciones y una uibcacion preferencial dentro de uno de los barrios mas importantes de BUenos Aires. Ademas de estar proximo a los mejores outlets.

What a great 5 night stay in BA!!
Carlos is such a nice guy, a super helpful host & responded really quickly if we sent him any questions.
The apartment is really modern & comfortable, walking distance to great food & bars in Palermo Soho, the tourist bus, the subway, etc.
We were given transport cards to use, there are maps & Lonely Planet guides in the apartment & also, fast internet.
We would definitely return & stay here again!!
Carlos’s place is amazing.  Great location, great host...highly recommend!!  Thanks for a great stay!

I spent 4 weeks with my family at Carlos apartment. The place is amazing! Well maintain, confortable, excellent location and specially Carlos was an outstanding host. He was on top of everything; answering every question we could have. The pool was small, but perfect for us with 2 kids. Next time in Buebos Aires I wouldn’t stay anywhere else but there.

The apartment is fantastic, very clean and tidy and very comfortable for a family of 4. A safe and secure place with a fantastic little shop downstairs, a safe neighbourhood and easy to public transport and taxi's to get to the centre of the city. Carlos is an excellent host and very attentive and made us feel really welcome. I would recommend Carlos' place to everyone.

For anyone who is looking to stay in Buenos Aires, this is the place to be.  I don't write reviews often, but when I do, it is because the experience is exceptional.  My friend and I flew in early morning and Carlos was more than willing to show us around the neighborhood, which is in the Palermo district.  He was responsive and thoughtful in his recommendations.  Whenever an issue came up, he was always available.  As for the apartment, it was in tip-top shape.  The apartment was spacious and had all the amenities advertised: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, WIFI, tv, balcony overlooking the street, and a rooftop pool to boot.  The neighborhood itself was a blast - not only were there so many places to eat, but it was accessible by public transportation and near lots of nightlife.  If I were to come back, I'd definitely stay at Carlos's place again!

The apartment is well appointed, comfortable and well located close to shops, supermarkets, eateries and public transport (bus, train, subway). Carlos was very approachable and helpful with local information.

The appartment is really really nice. And big. 4 people can live here. 2 stations of metro are at 10 minutes walk. And there are a lot of restaurants and bars reachable By foot.
Carlos is a perfect host, and gives a lot of help ! And he lives right next to the appartment, which is practicle !
There is also a small pool, good for small children.
It was the best place I reserved on Airbnb !

O apartamento é excelente, bem localizado, espaçoso, tudo novinho, cozinha bem equipada, próximo a mercados e metrô, para pegar táxi também é bem fácil. O Carlos foi super atencioso, nos ajudou em absolutamente tudo, tivemos uma ótima estadia!

My stay at Carlos' place was amazing since the booking process through the whole stay. He is responsive, his apartment is everything he promise and he is an outstanding host. He was there to receive us, gave us a lot of useful tips, he was really helpful with the money exchange and was open to help with anything we needed. 
The apartment is located really close to the Hip Palermo Soho area, it is a nice 15 minutes walk. The subway is really close as well and there are several big avenues nearby, so moving around is really easy. 
All in all, this is a great place, and I'd recommend it to anyone in a heartbeat. 
Thanks Carlos
Carlos' place is great! Exactly as described and even better if possible. Full of thoughtful touches which made our stay very enjoyable. Thank you Carlos!!

O apartamento é agradável; a sala e os quartos dão para a varanda.
O anfitrião é muito prestativo e disponível!
Recomendo!

Excelente hospedagem. Incluí tudo o que precisamos para nossa semana em Buenos Aires. Hospitalidade como a deste anfitrião é exatamente o que torna as experiências com o Airbnb tão bem sucedidas. Recomendo!
Carlos was a great host. The apartment is just as pictured. I would happily stay here again in the future.

I was a first time air bnb'er and very nervous about attempting it as a female traveller. I had debated staying in a hotel instead of an air bnb.
But Carlos was fabulous and put me at ease very quickly. His place was exactly as described and he was extremely helpful when asked. He even went above and beyond by getting me to a location that I was unsure how to get too. 
I have told him if I return to Buenos Aires I would stay at his air bnb again, without hesitation. 
I enjoyed the feeling of being in a home away from home, that you can't get in a hotel, and I felt very safe. Those were my prime worries as a first time air bnb'er. 
I highly recommend Carlos air bnb.

Carlos greeted my family the moment we arrived to let us in and give us our keys. What's important to note is he let us check in a few hours early and the day we left let us check out more than a few hours late. We would have been stuck rolling all our stuff through BA if it wasn't for his flexibility. I know it always possible, but if it is, he will accommodate you.

The place was exactly as described, clean and simple. The terrace is amazing and I recommend having dinner or at least drinks out there one night.

We didn't explore the neighborhood too much as I had my own agenda closer into the main tourist part of town. If you want to taxi or uber to Recoleta, the other end of Palermo, Puerto Madero, etc, its a 15-20 min drive. Nothing too bad at all, but it did add up after 5 days, so also consider public transport.

Thank you for your hospitality Carlos and for checking on us and answering all my questions within minutes. Until next time!

Nos hospedamos no apartamento do Carlos do dia 14 de junho a 19 de junho eu minha esposa e mais um casal de amigos e a viagem foi perfeita o apartamento tem excelentes acomodações, ar condicionado/aquecimento  nos dois dormitórios e  sala, o  mobiliário é novo,  as  camas e as roupas de cama são muito boas, a cozinha toda ela decorada segundo as fotos. Além do que o nosso anfitrião Carlos foi perfeito, ele nos recepcionou e mostrou os aposentos, bem como o funcionamento dos equipamentos do  apartamento e se colocou à disposição nesse ponto foi  foi uma grande surpresa porque sempre que nós precisamos do Carlos tanto para informações sobre a casa ou quanto algumas  sugestão de pontos turísticos, restaurantes,  supermercados e Outlets o Carlos sempre esteve disponível para nos atender, tanto pessoalmente pois ele mora em frente ao apartamento, ou pelo (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) ele sempre respondeu rapidamente as nossas solicitações.  Foi uma viagem perfeita recomendamos sim e vamos rencomendar para nossos amigos e em breve voltaremos, quando pudermos para o apartamento Carlos
Great apartment and awesome location. Carlos is very approachable and always willing to help!!

O apartamento é lindo, aconchegante e conta com uma varanda maravilhosa. A localização é ótima e próxima de metrô e supermercados. O apartamento é equipado com tudo que precisamos e muito bem conservado. Vale a pena se hospedar lá. O Carlos é um anfitrião perfeito e nos dá todo suporte necessário.

Carlos was one of the best, if not the best, hosts that I have ever had. His apartment is very spacious and is located close to shops, restaurants, and transportation. The place is also above a delicious quiet cafe that is perfect for a morning coffee and breakfast. 

I mean it when I say he is one of the best, if not the best host I have ever had. He helped with everything he could from recommendations, to helping with communication. 
I highly recommend

A casa de Carlos é suficiente pra quem procura um local tranquilo e confortável para ficar em B.A. A casa estava limpa e equipada com todos os acessórios anunciados (ar condicionado, geladeira, fogão, micro-ondas, lavadora de louças, wifi e etc).
Incredible apartment! Good location and a great host!
Logement très confortable et très bien équipé avec un accueil au top.

We liked our stay at the appartment very much. Carlos was very helpful and friendly at all times. The appartment is very well equipped and in very good condition. Only the street noise is bothering sometimes if you're sensitive to this.
Use my review to Carlos
Pool was amazing and home was bright modern and comfortable!!
Carlos was a excellent host, helpful and informative whilst providing a clean, comfortable well appointed apartment.

The apartment was perfect- just as described. We appreciated the aircon and comfy beds. There's a supermarket two blocks away. We made good use of the coffee machine.
Carlos recommended some great places to eat, and experience real Argentinian music. We used public transport and spent time in local neighbourhoods. The apartment is on the border of Soho and Hollywood- quite different yet exciting places to visit
It was easy communicating with Carlos as he was next door and quick to help with questions. 
Would fully recommend staying here

Great host great location 
The appartment is perfect and cosy

Let's begin by saying Carlos was a superb host who was there to greet us on our arrival, he's a wonderful source of city and local knowledge.  On entry to our apartment we felt secure, comfortable and very much at home, the fully equipped kitchen was like home, and laundry room (W & D) was also great to have available, which we used on a couple of occasions.

On this particular visit to BA we had a handicapped person with us who required easy access to the apartment, the entry ramp and elevator was so convenient, it was adjacent to our apartments front door too, I should add that's it's a very quiet one, a bonus was having Carlos's front door facing ours, we felt that was added security.

There's was also plenty of closet space for our needs, the bathrooms for us were perfect, they are compact but 2 people can share the main one easily, the walk-in shower was really convenient for our handicapped friend to use, there's also plenty of hot water and the towels were nice too, the balcony was very spacious and accessible from the living room as well as the two bedrooms, the internet was surprisingly fast, up on the rooftop there's a great wee cooling of pool (not for swimming), with plenty of room for sunbathing, Carlos advised us that only him and our apartment were allowed to use this facility, therefore to conclude, would we return to Carlos's apartment again, you bet we would, hopefully it'll be available on our next visit to BA...Thank you Carlos.

Logement très agréable, moderne et très bien équipé!
Carlos n'était pas là pendant le début de notre séjour donc nous n'avons pas pu beaucoup le voir mais il s'est montré très accueillant et très arrangeant. Une très bonne adresse

Great place to stay. Great beds and pillows.  Nice inside and outdoor areas. Good kitchen and laundry facilities and very secure.  Carlos was great and prompt to deal with. We appreciated having tourist books and subway cards to use.  The metro station is a few blocks away

Carlos war ein klasse Gastgeber, der sich wundervoll um unsere Gruppe gekümmert hat und sich immer wieder bei uns erkundigt hat, ob wir noch etwas benötigen.
Tolle Tipps für Restaurants und Ausflüge hat er auch parat. Die Wohnung war sauber, klasse eingerichtet und sah genau so aus wie auf den Bildern. Vor allem der große Balkon. Wir würden jederzeit wieder das Apartment mieten.

Carlos was a great host. He took care of our group and and had a lot of good tips about tours and restaurants. The apartment is clean and modern furnished, its looks like on the pictures. We would rent the apartment any time again.

My wife and me rented Carlos' Appartment for 5 weeks.
The appartment is very well equipped, from cuttlery to air-condition, beds and dish-washer, washing machine and dryer. 
The eevator brings right next to your door.
Carlos, the host, is incredible. He is more than helpful, he answers all questions, gives support regarding any request one might have.
We can only agree with the many multi-star feedbacks you find in this page.
Thanks Carlos and best regards
Ingrid+Wolfgang

A very nice, cosy, compact  and comfortable apartment! We enjoyed our stay there a lot. Carlos was a very nice, and friendly host. The place is exactly as seen in the pictures. The bulding is well designed, and there is a lovely cofeehouse downstairs. A small grocery and vegetable store is close by, a large supermarked 5 minutes away. There are many bus lines close by and two metro stops are in a comfortable walking distance. The terrace is wonderful and the beds very comfortable! Carlos is living next door and is very easy to reach if needed. An excellent choice!

Carlos apartment is great!  It is very modern and comfortable,  he has thought of everything. We didn't need much help from Carlos but he kept in contact with us to made check in/out very easy. The apartment is located close to the subtle and was very hand to get around. Would stay again. Gracias!
Carlos was a great host , great with communication and helped us with an early check in and we left his luggage after checkout as our flights were that evening.

Carlos is a true professional in this business. He is an architect and no wander this apartment is so nicely designed and decorated. The whole building is recently renovated and it is beautiful and safe. Carlos helped us with all our needs and that is so important when you don't speak Spanish. And he is your next door neighbor!  On top of that I had wonderful conversations with Carlos and learnt a lot about Buenos Aires and Argentina. Location: you are about 15 mins to the SUBTE (metro) station with a 10 mins drive to the downtown. Plenty of shops around the apartment where you can purchase food. Palermo is few blocks away to do shopping and go out. 

Definitely it was a great value for money and we would come again if in Buenos Aires!

All was as expected from Carlos' photos and description. The street is calm but close to restaurants and shops. The Subte (metro) is about a 10 minute walk - Carlos left us two metro cards to which you can add money for use on the metro or buses. For our family of four, the apartment was perfect.
O apartamento é muito bom, e fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Pedro. Foi tudo muito bom! Valeu Carlos!

Carlos was really a nice guy and very helpful. His flat was good, large enough for 3 people and good equipped. The location was good, only a few minutes to the underground, train and bus station. We had no problem to get to the city center (approx. 30 minutes). We used several times UBER and it worked great (even in the nights).

Carlos could not have been more helpful. We stayed there with my (future) mother and sister in law and it was important for me they were comfortable and their experience was easy in terms of language and travel. Carlos assisted with helping my sister in law who arrived a day ahead of the bunch and then received all of us on Sunday morning when we arrived. We had the necessary sets of keys ready for us, and since he lives just across the hallway he was able to help anytime needed (which was a few!) 
Some additional considerations worth mentioning are for example the fact that Carlos left 2 SUBE cards at our disposal in the house. If you plan on using public transport, you need one of these cards to top up and travel around with and they aren't apparently that easy to get hold of.  We used them, topped them up again and left them for the next visitors. 
The flat is comfortable and the balcony is really nice and spacious. Sadly the weather didn't permit us making much use of it, but the interior is really well lit so we could enjoy the outside feeling without the cold. 
Modern appliances are provided in the kitchen and the AC system made the place warm and cozy. There's a laundry room with a dryer in the house. 
The beds are quite firm and provided with memory foam pillows as well as normal pillows. Also bed linens and fluffy towels are provided. The place has 4 single beds, 2 in each room.
The area is pretty noisy but that's something you should expect in any Buenos Aires area that's near a hub of public transport. It is not the most attractive part of town but it is certainly within easy access to Palermo Soho and Palermo Hollywood areas (recommended for dining and drinks) as well as underground to attend most tourist attractions. 
Overall it was a great place to stay and I will use it in my next visit!

The Palermo Outlet was a glorious experience and Carlos was a gracious and expert host!  Carlos was out of town when we arrived, but he made sure his friend, Pedro, was available for a very flexible check-in.  Pedro was very helpful and friendly.  The apartment is clean, large, and very beautiful.  The terrace outside is huge, with doors to the living area and the two bedrooms--a perfect view to the streets outside and Buenos Aires beyond.  We could not have been more pleased with this place.  There is a cafe on the first floor where we had medialunas and coffee every morning.  The staff at the cafe were incredibly friendly and helpful as well.  The neighborhood is safe, pretty and the apartment is very convenient to subway, and just a few blocks walk to hot spots in Palermo.  In sum this place was perfect, Carlos was awesome, and 10/10 would stay again.

Carlos was extremely helpful and easy going with an early check in time for myself. The place was ideally situated and clean with good amenities. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in BA!
Carlos is a fantastic host! We all enjoyed the apartment. It is huge and bright, and it's located in a nice neighbourhood, near of shops, bars and restaurants. I'm sure i'll come back again.

Carlos is a great host!  He was always available to help us if we needed anything at all.  His own apartment is across the hall which is also helpful.  It's a quiet neighborhood with some good restaurants within 1/2 a mile.  Use Trip Advisor and Carlos can help too.  Kon Kon and Fukuro Noodle Bar are both great.  Taxis are pretty cheap and you can use subway for downtown attractions.

Wonderful place to stay in Buenos Aires!
Carlos is a perfect host. He helped us with everything.
He always made us feel welcome. The apartment itself is wonderful.  It was very clean, large rooms, comfort beds! And of course the real sweet small rooftop pool. 
Nice neighbourhood, Metro and bus Stations  near by--- perfect!
Thank´s so much!!

Carlos, who lives right next door, was available to let us in when we arrived. He always made us feel welcome, explained how everything worked, and could not possibly have been a better host. The apartment itself is great, too. It was very clean, not too noisy (by Buenos Aires standards), large enough, and it has the wonderful advantage of a small rooftop pool. On the whole, I really recommend this apartment.

We enjoyed the apartment and the location, it was great for our family of 4. There is plenty of space for 2 adults and 2 kids and the apartment looks just like the photos. We loved the pool in the afternoons and ate breakfast on the big balcony every morning. The location is good - we could catch the bus or walk to the restaurants and cafes in Palermo, although we often caught a taxi home at night. The apartment had everything we needed for a two week stay and we cooked at home several times. Our only problem was the power - we lost electricity several times throughout our stay. This happened to whole blocks of the city and is apparently common during the very hot days in February. A great place to base yourself, wonderful restaurants and neighbourhood close by. Thanks Carlos!

We certainly enjoyed our stay at Palermo Outlet. Carlos was very friendly, accommodating and spoke very good English. When asked he provided us with additional pillows and towels. The apartment was exactly as described, clean and roomy. We very much enjoyed the balcony for 'Happy Hour' and the rooftop pool area for relaxing in th sun. The area was within walking distance to outlet shopping, grocery store, restaurants and a short taxi ride to attractions downtown. Thank you, Carlos!

Carlos personally made himself available to greet us and show us various features of the apartment. It was very well appointed. We sought our this apartment specifically because there were two bedrooms, as we were travelling with a friend. It also had two bathrooms, one shower only and the other bath/shower. Large balcony. Skylight with retractable blind. Swimming pool on roof.  Lovely coffee shop at street entrance. We will return.

We all thoroughly enjoyed the apartment. It is spacious, bright, and in a neighbourhood accessible to public transportatation, shops and restaurants. Carlos made sure we were welcome and made himself or someone else available 24/7. cant wait to go back

Excellent séjour : l'appartement est très agréable et même supérieur à ce que ne laissent apparaitre les photos (toutes les commodités) ! Le quartier est très bien placé : à proximité de palermo soho (mais en plus calme), avec un quartier de boutiques de marques remisées (très intéressant) et le métro tout près.
Carlos  nous a fait un accueil parfait : proactif, en permanence à notre service sans être trop pressant y compris quand le séjour a été terminé (nous sommes resté à bs as quelques jours supplémentaires).
La piscine sur le toit est un véritable "plus", surtout en période de chaleur.
Nous réutiliserons sans hésitation si nous revenons à bs as en famille et recommandons vivement à tout voyageur !

It was easy for all four of us to feel comfortable at Carlos's place. Our little one enjoyed the pool on the rooftop, as it is just perfect for a small kid. The apartment is very well equipped and nicely decorated. Carlos himself was always there for us ready to help. Thank you so much for our stay, it was great!

Die Unterkunft ist schön, so wie beschrieben. Lage ist in Laufweite zum Palermo, auch schön. Einrichtung ist modern, Küche gut ausgestattet, Waschmaschine und Trockner auch vorhanden, WLAN funktioniert sehr gut. Sonnenterrasse mit Plansche-Pool wird mit anderen Hausparteien geteilt, wochentags ist da fast nie jemand anderes, am Wochenende gelegentlich.
Carlos war ein toller Gastgeber, Kommunikation lief super, Fragen/Probleme wurden sofort beantwortet/gelöst, er hat uns bei Ankunft mit lokalem Geld versorgt und auch gute Tips zum Geldtauschen gegeben. Gesamturteil: Empfehlenswert!

Very well appointed apartment, with plenty of room for four people. Really enjoyed the amount of light in the living room, and used the kitchen several times. The balcony is a little loud with traffic, but in the evenings it was no problem. Nice stay. The host was extremely accommodating, and communication was efficient and relaxed. Would recommend.

Estadia perfeita e maravilhosa. O apto é lindo, moderno e limpo. Sem defeitos, me senti na minha própria casa. Recomendo a todos se hospedarem no (URL HIDDEN) certeza ao voltar a Buenos Aires ficarei de novo no apto. O proprietário Carlos foi super atencioso desde o inicio da locação. Um agradecimento especial ao Sr. Patrício que me entregou as chaves e foi muito atencioso. Aos rapazes do lanchonete abaixo do apto que foram muito educados em me ajudar a localizar o sr. Patrício.

We felt so comfortable in the apt.  The location is excellent, we were able to walk to many places, or quickly take transportation.  Carlos is extremely helpful and goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable. This all made our trip very enjoyable. We would definitely stay there again.
Carlos made us feel very welcome, the place was as described as was the location which worked well for us.

Die Wohnung war wunderbar! Wir waren zu dritt da und hatten mehr als genug Platz. Highlight war der grosse Balkon, den wir - trotz winterlichen Temperaturen - oft gebrauchten. Es ist von Küchengeschirr über zwei Duschen bis zur Waschmaschine mit Tumbler alles vorhanden, was man während einem kurzen oder langen Aufenthalt brauchen könnte. 

Die Lage ist etwas ausserhalb, da zwei Sube- Haltestellen in ca. 7-8 Minuten zu Fuss zu erreichen sind und an der Strasse Juan B Justo günstige Taxis im 30- Sekunden- Takt vorbeifahren.

Wir waren fast drei Wochen in der Wohnung und würden sie sofort wieder buchen.

I have stayed at several Air B and Bs and this by far has been my best experience!  The apartment is beautiful and extremely clean and comfortable. It is just as advertised.  Everything you need is walking distance.  If you need anything Carlos is very happy to help.  He lives on the same floor.  I will be recommending this apartment to my friends who visit Buenos Aires and would live to come back and stay again!

Throughout our six-day stay, Carlos was a gracious host and even went above and beyond to accommodate us, from handling our early arrival and late departure, to loaning us an extension cord. The apartment was perfect for our family of 4. All the rooms were spacious, and the kitchen was well equipped. The table and chairs on the balcony would have been a lovely place to enjoy our morning coffee, if we were there at a warmer time of year. We were happy to see that the apartment building has an elevator, as our son started the vacation on crutches and wasn't able to climb the three flights of stairs to our apartment. It looks like a cafe will be opening in the next month or so on the ground level of the building. That will be a nice addition.
We didn't find much to do in Villa Crespo itself, so we spent most of the time in Recoleta and Palermo, the neighborhoods our daughter/tour guide was more familiar with. As advertised, the apartment is a short walk to the bus stop and subway station (although the public transportation system is quite confusing to those unfamiliar with it).

Carlos always responded to my e mails immediately . He was very welcoming offering to help or give us advice. He e mailed us whilst there to make sure we had everything. He lives in an apartment on the same floor so very easy to ask him anything. The flat is very convenient and really well equipped with reliable wi fi. The beds are very comfortable and good showers. A real bonus having a washing machine and dryer. Apartment is lovely, bright and spacious with great balconies. I left my glasses behind and Carlos found them and arranged a convenient time for me to collect them. So helpful

Lovely flat. Carlos was extraordinarly accommodating, allowing a VERY early check-in, then taking the time to explain everything to us, and answering all questions throughout our stay. The apartment is just as in the pictures, and had all facilities.

Palermo viejo is beautiful and fun, although this part of palermo which the apartment is in is a good 30 min walk from it, a little less bohemian and more urbane, but saying that this area was tranquil and  close to the subte stops. 

We would love to come back and visit!

Great location. Great host. Superbe flat. 
Go and take it

Carlos was a wonderful host! He let us into the place early and responded to every email within hours if not minutes. He called a taxi service for us to schedule a time to head to the airport - which was extremely helpful since many of our cab drivers had a hard time communicating with us. I would absolutely recommend his place to anyone wanting to visit Buenos Aires. The location was close to the metro and a short walk to all the restaurants/bars/stores Palermo has to offer. In addition, the house was clean, large, and well kept. An absolute gem!!! :) (He even had an iron and a HAIR DRYER!!!)
Carlos is an Excellent Host! He was very accommodating and flexible with our needs. He provided a ton of tips and ideas on exploring BA. An A+ host

Our host Carlos was in a word... awesome!  So gracious and eager to help us.  He made sure we felt comfortable and was always available if we had any questions.  The apartment is perfect.  It has a great central heating/air conditioning system.. consistently great wifi and a washer/dryer.  The apartment is centrally located in the Palermo area and as 2 young women traveling alone, we felt very safe here.  You can walk to many places and taxis are always readily available.  I can't say enough that our experience was amazing!!

Great apartment just on the outskirts of Palermo, just 10 mins walk into centre of Palermo where there's loads of restaurants and boutiques. Clean, spacious, with handy things such as a washing machine, and a supermarket in walking distance. The guys were really kind and very helpful. Buenos Aires is a really great city, we had a wonderful time.
